mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT CLASS_NO AS CLASSNO, CLASS_NAME AS CLASSNAME, TO_CHAR(CLASS_STARTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STARTDATE , TO_CHAR(CLASS_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENDDATE, CLASS_POINT AS POINT , SPORT_NAME AS SPORTNAME, INS_NO AS INSNO, INS_NAME AS INSNAME, INS_ID AS INSID, INS_AREA AS INSAREA, PROFILE_PATH AS PROFILEPATH , (SELECT (SUM(GRADE)/(COUNT(*))) FROM REVIEWVIEW WHERE INS_NO = CV.INS_NO AND CLASS_NO = CV.CLASS_NO) AS GRADE FROM CLASSVIEW CV ORDER BY CLASS_DATE) GROUP BY CLASSNO, CLASSNAME, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, POINT, SPORTNAME, INSNO, INSNAME, INSID, INSAREA, PROFILEPATH, GRADE) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{vo.start} AND #{vo.end}

SELECT C.CLASS_NO AS CLASSNO, C.CLASS_NAME AS CLASSNAME, C.CLASS_DATE CLASSDATE, P.MEM_NAME AS INSNAME , I.INS_NO AS INSNO, P.MEM_ID AS INSID, TO_CHAR(C.CLASS_STARTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STARTDATE, TO_CHAR(C.CLASS_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENDDATE , I.PROFILE_PATH AS PROFILEPATH, SPO.SPORT_NAME AS SPORTNAME, C.CLASS_POINT AS POINT, C.CLASS_CONTENT AS CONTENT , TCTS.START_TIME AS STARTTIME, TCTE.START_TIME AS ENDTIME , (SELECT LISTAGG(S.SIGUNGU_NAME,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY IA.REQ_NO) FROM INSTRUCTOR_AREA IA LEFT JOIN SIGUNGU S ON IA.SIGUNGU_NO = S.SIGUNGU_NO WHERE IA.REQ_NO = IR.REQ_NO GROUP BY IA.REQ_NO) AS INSAREA FROM CLASS C LEFT JOIN INSTRUCTOR I ON C.INS_NO = I.INS_NO LEFT JOIN INSTRUCTOR_REQUEST_PRC IRP ON I.REQ_PRC_NO = IRP.REQ_PRC_NO LEFT JOIN INSTRUCTOR_REQUEST IR ON IRP.REQ_NO = IR.REQ_NO LEFT JOIN PRIVACY P ON IR.MEM_NO = P.MEM_NO LEFT JOIN SPORT SPO ON C.SPORT_NO = SPO.SPORT_NO LEFT JOIN CLASS_TIME CT ON C.CLASS_NO = CT.CLASS_NO LEFT JOIN TIME TCTS ON CT.START_TIME_NO = TCTS.TIME_NO LEFT JOIN TIME TCTE ON CT.END_TIME_NO = TCTE.TIME_NO LEFT JOIN CLASS_STOP CS ON C.CLASS_NO = CS.CLASS_NO WHERE C.CLASS_NO = #{classNo} AND CT.TIME_ADD_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT MAX(TIME_ADD_DATE) FROM CLASS_TIME WHERE TIME_ADD_DATE <= SYSDATE AND CLASS_NO = #{classNo}) AND SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(MEM_NO) AS MEM_COUNT FROM CLASS_RESERVATION WHERE PRC_DATE IS NOT NULL AND CLASS_NO = #{classNo}

SELECT C.CLASS_STARTDATE, C.CLASS_ENDDATE , TCTS.START_TIME AS CLASS_START_TIME, TCTE.START_TIME AS CLASS_END_TIME FROM CLASS C LEFT JOIN CLASS_TIME CT ON C.CLASS_NO = CT.CLASS_NO LEFT JOIN TIME TCTS ON CT.START_TIME_NO = TCTS.TIME_NO LEFT JOIN TIME TCTE ON CT.END_TIME_NO = TCTE.TIME_NO WHERE C.CLASS_NO = #{classNo}
SELECT RSVTIME FROM INSSCHEDULEVIEW WHERE INSNO = #{insNo} AND RSVDATE = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT REP_REASON_NO AS REPREASONNO, REP_REASON AS REPREASON FROM REPORT_REASON ORDER BY 1
